mapper.update: update board set btitle=#{btitle}, bcontent=#{bcontent} where bid=#{bid}
mapper.select: select bid, btitle, bcontent ,bhit, to_char(bdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') bdate, bfile, bsfile from board where bid=#{bid}
mapper.update: update board set bhit = bhit+1 where bid=#{bid}
mapper.select: select rownum, rno, bid, btitle, bhit, to_char(bdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') bdate from (select bid, btitle, bhit, bdate from board order by bdate desc)
